tool_description: Generate hashtags based on image, text and get the post count detail of that hashtag
name: Hashtag
title: Hashtag

api_list.name: Trending tags from Country
api_list.description: Gets trending tags from a specific country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hashtag5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2.1/trending/United States/tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashtag5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hashtag5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2.1/trending/{country_name}/tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashtag5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Top Hashtags
api_list.description: Gets a list of all the top hashtags
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hashtag5.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2.1/tag/top"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashtag5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
